archimate:BusinessObject.name: BrokerCoordinationDetails
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation:
"This class implements the semantics of the BrokerCoordinates association, which defines which PolicyServers are coordinated by which PolicyBrokers.
The semantics of this class will be more fully defined in the next version of the DEN-ng specification. This association defines the set of PolicyServers that this PolicyBroker coordinates the actions of."
